content:
You sit by the water's edge and spend some quality time with Bo before continuing on your journey. He thanks you again for helping to mend his relationship with Olyv. Even though Olyv joining the Rangers disrupted their plans, their friendship is stronger now than ever before.

"Hey, since I got you here, want to take a look through some of my wares?" he asks. "I do owe you one, after all."

Discard Bo. Each Ranger may either soothe 2 fatigue or equip a gear from their hand (without paying its energy cost).
